DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether goal direct nutritional intervention reduce convalescence period patient undergoing radical cystectomy ( RC ) . The aim examine effect quality life standard nutritional strategy rest bowel till clear sign bowel recovery feed orally bowel recovery versus goal-directed nutritional intervention combine oral intake parenteral nutrition , patient undergo RC .
DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize control trial . Inclusion criterion : Bladder cancer , ability give inform consent . Exclusion criterion : Previous radiation therapy pelvic area , ureterocutaneostomy robot-assisted surgery . The intervention aim secure 75 % patient 's total energy protein need meet hospitalization . Primary outcome : Quality Life , use EORTC QLQ-C30 BLM30 questionnaire . Secondary outcome : Body-weight , Hand Grip strength , biochemical measure , length hospital stay , time bowel recovery . The follow-up period 12 week . Statistical analysis perform collaboration statistician .
